events.name: Hackware Labs v0.2 Fernvale Workshop
events.description: How to develop your own application for a Fernvale platform: MediaTek 6260 chip package that has ARM processor and many other capabilities: GSM, GPS, BT, WiFi, battery controller, and more... The workshop will be conducted by Sean 'Xobs', and (if time permits) Andrew Bunnie Huang. Some links: 1. bunnie, Xobs: Fernvale: An Open Hardware and Software Platform, Based on the (nominally) Closed-Sour https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hpEqDPYtf9s 2. Fernly - Fernvale research OS https://github.com/xobs/fernly
events.location: Hackerspace.SG, 344B King George's Ave, King George's Building, Singapore
